name: Full Break
effects: Physical damage (1.6x, ATK) to one enemy
Reduce ATK, DEF, MAG and SPR by 30% for 3 turns to one enemy
Reduce resistance to all elements by 30% for 3 turns to one enemy

name: Full Break
身心潰擊
풀 브레이크
Brise-tout
Allesbrecher
Rompetodo
desc_short: Damage and reduce ATK, DEF, MAG, SPR, and fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance for one enemy
攻擊1名敵人+降低攻擊防禦魔力精神、火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性的數值
적 1명에게 피해+공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력과 불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력 감소
Dégâts et réduit ATT/DEF/MAGIE/PSY et la rés. feu/glace/foudre/eau/vent/terre/lumière/ténèbres d'un ennemi
Fügt einem Gegner Schaden zu und reduziert ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY sowie Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel.
Daña y reduce el ATQ, DEF, MAG y ESP de un enemigo y su res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad
desc_long: Deals damage to one enemy and reduces their ATK, DEF, MAG, SPR, and fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance.
攻擊1名敵人，並降低其攻擊防禦魔力精神、火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性的數值。
적 1명에게 피해를 주고, 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력과 불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력을 감소시킵니다.
Dégâts et réduit ATT/DEF/MAGIE/PSY et la rés. feu/glace/foudre/eau/vent/terre/lumière/ténèbres d'un ennemi
Fügt einem Gegner Schaden zu und reduziert ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY sowie Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel.
Inflige daño y reduce el ATQ, la DEF, la MAG y el ESP de un enemigo y su resistencia al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad.
